Cut through the noise of traditional scheduling and streamline your meetings like never before. With TuCalendi Chrome Extension, you can control all your meeting links, contacts, and schedules in one place - anywhere you’re online.

Here’s what you can do with the TuCalendi Chrome Extension, whether you’re using a free or paid account:

- Quickly find and share your scheduling links
- View and manage your upcoming meetings
- Keep track of your contacts and meeting history
- Instantly add event links directly to your emails

Say goodbye to the hassle and hello to effortless organization!

About TuCalendi
Ready to take control of your schedule and never miss a beat? With TuCalendi, you can effortlessly manage your meetings, contacts, and scheduling links—all in one sleek platform. Whether you’re a pro at planning or just looking to simplify your day, TuCalendi has your back. Don’t wait - your time, your rules, your TuCalendi!
